lines.text: I'm guessing this is where the fire was?
That'd be a good guess, yeah.
It's, uh... there's a lot of ash. That's pretty weird, right?
What did you expect? There was a fire!
Yeah, but for, what, less than fifteen minutes?
Whatever burnt to an unrecognizable crisp here, it burnt up <c=#FF00FF>really quick.</c>
What's this sticking out of the pile? Some kind of... wire?
Actually, there's a few wires sticking out of this pile. And... that's about it.
They look... kinda like unwound coathangers?
Looks more like balin' wire, to me.
...Baling wire. For balin' hay or straw, like you'd do on a farm.
Oh. Yeah. One of those farms I'm all the time hanging out on. So I would totally know what that is.
A big pile of ash in the corner of the room, where it looks like the fire was raging the worst.
There's a few weird wires sticking out of the pile. Leo says they're the kind you'd find on a farm?
We're in the middle of the city, so I dunno what that stuff's doing here.
There's some haywire sticking out of the pile. Probably used to be food for the goat.
